tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bus_tracking (
  bus_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE bus_gps_data (
  gps_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  gps_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE train_gps_data (
  gps_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  gps_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE passenger_notifications (
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  message VARCHAR(255),
  notification_time TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  transport_type VARCHAR(50)
);
